rule: The response must not include more than one word under any circumstances.
input: sentence: He jumped high., word: jumped
validityText:
The input provides a sentence "He jumped high." and a word "jumped". The sentence is a grammatically valid string containing multiple words. The sentence contains a punctuation mark at the end, which is acceptable according to the specification. The word "jumped" is a substring of the sentence. The word does not include any additional punctuation. All rules specified in the input specification are followed.
OK
